games.name: Elden Ring
games.genres: Action role-playing game, Adventure game, Fighting game, Platform game
games.platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Series S, Microsoft Windows
games.longdiscription: Elden Ring is a massive, critically acclaimed dark fantasy action RPG from FromSoftware, set in the vast, ruined world of the Lands Between, where you play as a Tarnished warrior guided by grace to find the shards of the shattered Elden Ring, defeat demigod bosses, and become the Elden Lord. It combines challenging 'Souls-like' combat with an expansive open world that offers unparalleled freedom, exploration, crafting, customization, unique Spirit Ashes summons, and seamless co-op/PvP multiplayer, all built on lore co-created with George R.R. Martin
games.shortdiscription: Elden Ring is a massive, critically acclaimed dark fantasy action RPG from FromSoftware.

games.name: Baldur's Gate 3
games.platforms: PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Series S, Microsoft Windows
games.longdiscription: Bladur's Gate 3 is a 2023 role-playing video game by Larian Studios. It is the third installment in the Baldur's Gate series. The game's full release for Windows happened in August, with PlayStation 5, macOS, and Xbox Series X/S later in the same year. In the game's narrative, the party seeks to cure themselves of a parasitic tadpole infecting their brain. It can be played alone or in a group.
games.shortdiscription: Bladur's Gate 3 is a 2023 role-playing video game by Larian Studios.
